name: Overdensity
description:
Lore

We are in Space. It’s 2005 – the year the galaxy this game takes place in, the Virgo Stellar Stream, was discovered. The stream is thought to be the remains of a dwarf spheroidal galaxy that is in the process of merging with the Milky Way – and our spaceship is the one-man army trying to stop it

Game Description
Space-themed five-lane endless runner with enemies and solid obstacles that will need to be destroyed and/or dodged respectively. There will be power-ups the player can use to help them along the way. One endless level. The skybox will change the further you go to show your progression through the galaxy.

Time Warp

You will experience this at the start of the game, and frequently as you travel further - this phenomenon causes time to speed up as more enemies and obstacles will come your way, eventually reaching the cosmic speed limit.

Powerups

  • Rapidfire - Hold down left click!
  • Health Pack - Heals you to full HP
  • Shield - Conjures a protective barrier
  • Megabomb - Unleashes Destruction

Travel as far as you possibly can!
